    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="es">El teorema de Pitágoras</string>
            <string language="en">The theorem of Pythagoras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Theorem von Pythagorase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le théorème de Pythagore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O theorem de Pythagoras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il teorema di Pythagoras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το θεώρημα Πυθαγόρα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la demostración del teorema de Pitágoras. También se hace una introducción histórica al teorema.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to prove the theorem of Pythagoras. The unit includes a historical introduction to the theorem.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Pitágoras</string>
            <string language="en">Pythagoras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema</string>
            <string language="en">theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rectángulo</string>
            <string language="en">right</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">demostración</string>
            <string language="en">demonstration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Theorem von Pythagorase zu prüfen. Die 
Maßeinheit schließt eine historische Einleitung zum Theorem ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de prouver le théorème de Pythagore. L'unité 
inclut une introduction historique au théorème.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações provar o 
theorem de Pythagoras. A unidade inclui uma introdução 
histórica ao theorem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
dimostrare il teorema di Pythagoras. L'unità include 
un'introduzione storica al teorema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να αποδείξει το θεώρημα Πυθαγόρα. Η μονάδα περιλαμβάνει
μια ιστορική εισαγωγή στο θεώρημα.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
